frothy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a liquid that is frothy has lots of small bubbles on top
frothy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a frothy book, film etc is enjoyable but not serious or important
frothy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a frothy market is one in which prices of something are rising and beginning to be higher than the thing’s real value – used in business
